meanings.definition: Worn or damaged by the feet
meanings.sent1: The footworn path was smooth from constant use.
meanings.sent2: The footworn carpet in the hallway had patches of threadbare spots.
meanings.sent3: The footworn shoes looked like they had trekked through a hundred adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as footworn as the old wooden bridge in the park.
meanings.sent5: The footworn steps of the ancient temple echoed with the whispers of history.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of wear from being walked on
meanings.sent1: The footworn wooden floors creaked with each step.
meanings.sent2: The footworn path through the forest was easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: The footworn welcome mat at the door had seen better days.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as footworn as the path up the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The footworn grass in the park bore witness to the children's play.
